resources.string: Keep server running if app is killed
New version of PHP(%1$s) is available, do You want to install it?
Cannot start server - document root directory does not exist

This is totally free and open source app that works using PHP built-in server and can be started automatically on boot.

PHP(version %1$s) has these extensions: core, date, ereg, libxml, openssl, pcre, sqlite3, zlib, bcmath, bz2, calendar, ctype, curl, dom, hash, fileinfo, filter, ftp, gd, gettext, gmp, spl, iconv, intl, json, mbstring, mcrypt, session, standard, mysqlnd, mysqli, odbc, pdo, pdo_mysql, pdo_odbc, pdo_pgsql, pdo_sqlite, pgsql, phar, posix, pspell, recode, reflection, mysql, simplexml, soap, sockets, exif, tidy, tokenizer, wddx, xml, xmlreader, xmlrpc, xmlwriter, xsl, zip, cli_server, mhash, ssh2, opcache, phalcon, yaf, yar, id3, lzf, oauth, quickhash, bbcode, xmldiff, xdiff, rar, gender, stats

Recommended for usage: in development or for very small websites with very small amount of visitors, couse this server supports only one request at a time.

Author

Tautvydas Andrikys, esminis@esminis.lt

Russian translation

Бондарев Дмитрий, fserg37@gmail.com
List of all PHP extensions, part of them can be enabled or disabled

This is short manual of some important parts of application:

Server document root by default is sdcard/www so put files there.

PHP configuration is in php.ini file which is loaded from document root, edit it as you need(but if you change it dont forget session.save_path and upload_tmp_dir).

PHP locales will not work - setlocale and such.

There are 2 ODBC drivers included in this application: PostgreSQL and SQLite3. If you want to use ODBC with them then do something like this:

odbc_connect(\'Driver=SQLite3;Database=\' . $path_to_file, \'\', \'\'); // SQLite3

odbc_connect(\'Driver=PostgreSQL;Database=\' . $database_name . \';Server=\' . $server, \'\', \'\'); // PostgreSQL
Install default files (index.php, config.ini, …) to document root
Error: document root directory not empty
